Sentencas: Interest in low-temperature operation of solid oxide fuel cells is growing.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Recent advances in perovskite phases have resulted in an efficient H+/O2-/e(-) triple-conducting electrode BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta for low-temperature fuel cells.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we further develop BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta for electrolyte applications by taking advantage of its high ionic conduction while suppressing its electronic conduction through constructing a BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta-ZnO p-n heterostructure.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With this approach, it has been demonstrated that BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta can be applied in a fuel cell with good electrolyte functionality, achieving attractive ionic conductivity and cell performance.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Further investigation confirms the hybrid H+/O2- conducting capability of BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta-ZnO. An energy band alignment mechanism based on a p-n heterojunction is proposed to explain the suppression of electronic conductivity and promotion of ionic conductivity in the heterostructure.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our findings demonstrate that BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-delta is not only a good electrode but also a highly promising electrolyte.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The approach reveals insight for developing advanced low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes.
Titulo: Shaping triple-conducting semiconductor BaCo0.4Fe0.4Zr0.1Y0.1O3-δ into an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
